title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.7 - Storage, handling or transportation of atomic weapons prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.7 - Storage, handling or transportation of atomic weapons prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall, at any time, store, keep, handle, use or
transport at, in or upon the air terminal any weapon of war employing atomic
fission or radioactive force. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1272.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
